instruction: Music streaming is a platform that allows users to listen to music on-demand, typically through an internet connection. It is a product of the digital age and has revolutionized the way people consume music. The most popular music streaming platforms include Spotify, Apple Music, and Amazon Music. These platforms offer a vast library of music, personalized playlists, and the ability to discover new artists and songs. Music streaming has become a dominant force in the music industry, providing an alternative to traditional album sales and radio listening. With the rise of music streaming, the music industry has seen a shift in revenue generation, with streaming services now accounting for a significant portion of industry income. As a result, music streaming platforms have become an essential part of the music industry ecosystem.
